https://tmrev.io/movie/86175-Delicate Crime 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/gz0175b134Ow6bmU4CFgECHPnul.jpg Antônio Martins, respected theatrical critic, is a very rational man. But a chance meeting with young Inês, a nude painting model, is going to rock him. Inês keeps a relationship with painter José Torres Campana, an older man with a deep influence over her. Antônio gets jealous, and the three become characters of a drama saturated with desire and danger. Delicate Crime
